mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mp_board(BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, refer, step, depth) VALUES (mp_board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, (SELECT refer FROM mp_board WHERE bno = ${bno}), (SELECT MAX(step) FROM mp_board WHERE bno = ${bno}) + 1, (SELECT MAX(depth) FROM mp_board WHERE bno = ${bno}) + 1)
